TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Block extends System.Windows.Documents.TextElement
Public MustInherit Class Block Inherits TextElement
public ref class Block abstract : System::Windows::Documents::TextElement

summary.span: 为所有块级别流内容元素提供基类的抽象类。

span.span: An abstract class that provides a base for all block-level flow content elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 继承自 类（如 ）的元素可用于对公共父级下的元素进行分组，或将公共属性应用于组。Elements that inherit from the class (such as ) can be used to group elements under a common parent or to apply common attributes to a group. 从概念上讲，这类似于在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)]中使用 \
标记的方式。Conceptually, this is similar to how you might use the \
tag in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)].

[!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_BordersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_bordersxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕快照：1/4 的/蓝色、1个边框](~/add/media/block-borders.png "屏幕截图：块周围 1/4 英寸粗的蓝色边框")![Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block](~/add/media/block-borders.png "Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness BorderThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.BorderThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边框粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the border thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，指定要应用的边框量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of border to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值 `"10"` 等效于 `"10,10,10,10"`的值。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序 值的字符串表示形式，这些值对应于左、上、右和下（按此顺序）的独立厚度尺寸。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 会导致 "内容" 左侧有5个像素的边框，内容的上边为10个像素，内容右侧有15个像素的边框，内容的下方有20个像素的边框。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of border to the left of content, 10 pixels of border above content, 15 pixels of border to the right of content, and 20 pixels of border below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`，`in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供统一的边框1英寸。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform border of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`，`in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 元素（）的 属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_BordersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_bordersxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕快照：1/4 的/蓝色、1个边框](~/add/media/block-borders.png "屏幕截图：块周围 1/4 英寸粗的蓝色边框")![Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block](~/add/media/block-borders.png "Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_borders)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_borders)]

value.span: 如果为 ，则在此元素之前自动插入一个分栏符；否则为 。

member this.ClearFloaters : System.Windows.WrapDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置某个 元素所包含的任何 元素的重新定位方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which any elements contained by a element should be repositioned.

value.span: 值之一，它指定将 元素中所包含的任何 元素与其他内容分隔开来的方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the direction in which to separate any elements from other content contained in the element.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它指示浮标应在现有位置上呈现。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that floaters should be rendered in place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性影响内容在 中的布局方式，旨在用于防止 元素 congesting 元素的内容。The property affects how content is laid out within a and is intended to be used to prevent elements from congesting the contents of a element. 为此属性指定方向会导致 floater 在 内容内以统一方向重定位。Specifying a direction for this property causes floaters to be repositioned in a uniform direction within the content. Floater 不会重新定位在其父级 之外。Floaters are not repositioned outside of their parent . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 元素中内容流的相对方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 值之一，指定相对流动方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 设置此属性将导致 元素的内容重新沿指示的方向流动。Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction. 内容的流动方向通常对应于所表示语言的原始流方向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语是自然从右到左的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英语、德语和俄语是自然从左至右流动的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > **此属性的值不会自动更改，与操作系统所使用的语言相匹配。如果需要对默认值**为**n 的默认**值使用其他值 **，则必须自行指定。****The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. If you need to use a different value th**a**n the default of** **, you must specify it yourself.** ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|，, | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 元素（）的 属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsHyphenationEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsHyphenationEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用文字的自动断字功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic hyphenation of words is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果启用自动对文字进行断字和添加连字符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if automatic breaking and hyphenation of words is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动断字功能使 元素可以根据当前布局条件自动对单词进行断字和断字。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a element to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 这样一来，就可以在一行中开始，并继续下一步，并在对齐文本中实现更均匀的空白分布。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 根据标准语法规则对单词进行断字和断字。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 元素的 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_HyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_hyphenatexaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocument 连字符已启用](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "屏幕截图：启用了 FlowDocument 连字符")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下图显示了 =`false`的默认设置呈现同一示例的方式。The following figure shows how the same example renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![屏幕截图：包含禁用的连字符的 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "屏幕截图：包含已禁用的连字符的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Hyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_hyphenate)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Hyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_hyphenate)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LineHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 0.0034 到 160000 范围内的每行高度（以与设备无关的像素为单位），或使用 自动确定高度。

span.span: The height of each line in device independent pixels, in the range of 0.0034 to 160000, or to determine the height automatically.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值（等效于 `Auto`的属性值）表示行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of `Auto`) indicates that the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 更改此值不会更改关联文本的高度;相反，它更改包含文本的行的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 若要更改文本大小，请使用 属性。To change the size of the text, use the property. 除了此属性， 中的行布局会受到其 属性的影响。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 大于或等于0.0034 但小于160000的 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0034 but equal to or less than 160000. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的*双精度*值（只不过 `Auto`），后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`、`in`、`cm`、`pt`。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是厘米;1cm = = （96/2.54） px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = （96/72） px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动Auto 使行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。Causes the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 等效于 的属性值。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 元素的 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_lineheightxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "屏幕截图：FlowDocument LineHeight")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight") 下图显示了 =的默认设置呈现相同的。The following figure shows how the same renders with the default setting of =. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocument LineHeight 默认值](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "屏幕截图：FlowDocument LineHeight 默认值")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_lineheight)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_lineheight)]

span.span: is set to a non-positive value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness Margin { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.Margin : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边距粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，指定要应用的边距量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of margin to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是位于元素内容区域外、元素内容区域边缘和父元素边缘之间的缓冲空间。 is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. 与 （这是在元素的内容区域内部、元素的内容和元素的内部边缘之间）的缓冲区空间。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值 `"10"` 等效于 `"10,10,10,10"`的值。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序 值的字符串表示形式，这些值对应于左、上、右和下（按此顺序）的独立厚度尺寸。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 会使内容的左侧有5个像素的边距，内容的上方边距为10个像素，内容右侧有15个像素的边距，内容的下方有20个像素的边距。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of margin to the left of content, 10 pixels of margin above content, 15 pixels of margin to the right of content, and 20 pixels of margin below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`，`in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1in"` 在所有方向上提供统一的边距。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform margin of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`，`in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 元素（）的 属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPaddingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_marginpaddingxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. 使用夸大的厚度和颜色进行说明。Exaggerated thicknesses and colors are used for illustration. ![屏幕快照：具有填充和边距的段落](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "屏幕截图：具有填充和边距的段落")![Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_marginpadding)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_marginpadding)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是位于元素的内容区域内部、元素的内容和元素的内部边缘之间的缓冲空间。 is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. 与 相比，它是位于元素内容区域外、元素内容区域边缘和父元素边缘之间的缓冲空间。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值 `"10"` 等效于 `"10,10,10,10"`的值。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序 值的字符串表示形式，这些值对应于左、上、右和下（按此顺序）的独立厚度尺寸。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 将在内容左侧填充5个像素，在内容右侧填充10个像素，在内容右侧填充15个像素，在内容的下方填充20个像素。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`，`in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供1英寸的统一填充。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`，`in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如 `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 元素（）的 属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). summary.span: 获取一个 元素的集合，这些元素是当前 元素的同级元素。

span.span: Gets a collection of elements that are siblings to the current element.

value.span: 一个包含子级 元素的 ，这些元素直接由当前 元素的父级承载；如果当前 元素无父级，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the child elements that are directly hosted by the parent of the current element, or if the current element has no parent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的 包含用于访问集合的 元素;也就是说，拥有此属性的元素被视为自己的同级，目的是生成同级的集合。The returned by this property includes the element through which the collection is accessed; that is, the element that owns this property is considered to be its own sibling for the purposes of generating the collection of siblings.

[!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignmentXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_textalignmentxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例如何呈现 文本对齐方式（默认值）。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders with text alignment (the default). ![屏幕快照：左对齐属性值](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "屏幕截图：左对齐的 TextAlign 属性值")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left") 下图显示了 文本对齐方式如何呈现同一示例。The following figure shows how the same example renders with text alignment. ![屏幕快照： Right 的文本对齐值](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "屏幕截图：右对齐的 TextAlign 值")![Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right") 下图显示了 文本对齐方式如何呈现同一示例。The following figure shows how the same example renders with text alignment. ![屏幕快照：中心的文本对齐属性值](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "屏幕截图：居中对齐的 TextAlign 属性值")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignment](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_textalignment)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignment](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_textalignment)]

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。
